overview: Kelly and her sorority sisters go on a girls only retreat to train two new pledges in the way of the Pi Pi Sorority but they aren't alone for long as the horny boys of Sigma Pau Fraternity arrive to find some hot, wet college pussy waiting. This is one sex filled weekend, as the new girls get plowed in every hole available during a wild double penetration orgy. Nobody is left dry in the wildest Kelly the Co-Ed to date.  Like Kelly says, "GO FOR WHAT YOU KNOW" and Kelly knows dick.
title: Kelly the Coed 7: Sorority Retreat
